review_data.title: The best restaurant in Leukerbad hands down
review_data.content: We ordered the crispy duck pancakes and the peppered beef on the hot plate, both were absolutely delicious and savoury! My plate was still sizzling and the crispy duck was hot and crispy. Only regret was not finding this place on our first night.

review_data.title: Frisches Sushi zum dahin schmelzen

review_data.title: Yummy Asian Food!
review_data.content: I’m so glad I ate here! The food was delicious and fairly priced. Staff was very very helpful since my family only spoke English. Best food we have had in Zurich!

review_data.title: Mittagessen
review_data.content: Waren dort Mittagessen und haben alles vom Buffet probiert. Es war super Lecker und die Bedienung war angenehm

review_data.title: Our favorite Chinese restaurant
review_data.content: Simple seating and minimal decor, but the food is great. The owners speak little English and German, and the menu is extensive, but we’ve always gotten the right thing. We go here a lot.

review_data.title: Excellent
review_data.content: The food was freshly cooked and delicious. We had sushi and noodle and rice dishes. We did not have vegetarian options. The cooked dishes were delicious and each one with its own distinct flavour . The kids eat their sushi but then tried and enjoyed...More

review_data.title: Amazing food
review_data.content: The food is extremely tasty and very well cooked! The staff is very nice and the restaurant very quiet. I really recommend it.

review_data.title: Great food and friendly service
review_data.content: This is a new restaurant and a bit out of the way, but we loved it. The service is friendly, the food is delicious and arrives quickly, and the menu is huge so you're bound to find something you love, including sushi and dim sum...More
